input.description: The name of the adapter to use to handle the request. Default adapter name: ServiceNowActor.

Sample items Xml:
1. <items> <proxy-settings> <host>10.128.1.2</host> <port>808</port> <user-name>test</user-name> <password>test</password> </proxy-settings> <item> <connection-parameters> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password>admin</password> </connection-parameters> <query> <approval>Not Yet Requested</approval> <change-task-type>Planning</change-task-type> <change-request>CHG0030006</change-request> <closed-at>2020-03-17 10:17:57</closed-at> <closed-by>System Administrator</closed-by> <created-from>Workflow</created-from> <description>Post implementation testing</description> <escalation>Normal</escalation> <impact>3 - Low</impact> <knowledge>0</knowledge> <made-sla>1</made-sla> <number>CTASK0010001</number> <parent>CHG0030006</parent> <priority>3 - Moderate</priority> <reassignment-count>0</reassignment-count> <short-description>Post implementation testing</short-description> <sys-mod-count>2</sys-mod-count> <state>2</state> </query> <update> <description>Please initiate the Implementation process.</description> <due-date>2015-01-13 05:30:20</due-date> <escalation>Normal</escalation> <expected-start>2015-01-11 05:30:20</expected-start> <impact>3 - Low</impact> <knowledge>0</knowledge> <made-sla>1</made-sla> <opened-at>2015-01-07 05:30:20</opened-at> <opened-by>System Administrator</opened-by> <order>9</order> <number>CTASK0010001</number> <parent>CHG0030006</parent> <priority>2 - High</priority> <reassignment-count>0</reassignment-count> <short-description>Implementation Task</short-description> <state>3</state> </update> </item> </items>
2. <items> <item> <query> <all/> </query> <update> <state>2</state> </update> </item> </items>
Elements' Description:
proxy-settings[Optional] - Parent tag that contains proxy server information. This is a child of "items" tag.
Following tags are valid only if "proxy-settings" is provided.
host[Conditional] - IP or hostname of proxy server. This is required if "proxy-settings" is provided.
port[Conditional] - Port on which the proxy server is listening for requests. This is required if "proxy-settings" is provided.
user-name[Optional] - Username required to authenticate against the proxy server.
password[Optional] - Password required to authenticate against the proxy server. Password can be encrypted by specifying the encryption type attribute. For example: <password encryption-type = "Base64">cGFzc3dvcmQ=</password>
item [Required]: This is a child of <items>. This <item> tag can be multiple times to support "multiple items support".
connection-parameters [Optional]: It is parent tag of 'username' and 'password'. It is required when the user wants to override the default values for username and password provided in the adapter configuration.
user-name [Optional]: Valid value: Username to be used to execute the request.
Note: Required if <connection-parameters> tag is specified in request.
password [Optional]: Valid value: Password to be used to execute the request. Password can be encrypted by specifying the encryption type attribute. For example: <password encryption-type = "Base64">cGFzc3dvcmQ=</password>
Note: Required if <connection-parameters> tag is specified in request.
The elements under <query> element is used to locate the 'change' to be updated. If multiple matching 'changes' are found, then all those are updated. Elements under <update> element are desired updated value of respective fields.
query [Optional]: The elements under <query> tag are used to locate the 'change' to be updated. If multiple matching changes are found, then all these are updated.
update [Optional]: The elements under <update> tag contain values for fields being updated. If this element is not specified then no field of 'change' gets updated.
